title: Suitland Fatal Shooting Under Investigation
body:
*****Spanish Translation Follows*****Homicide Unit detectives are investigating a fatal shooting in Suitland. The victim is 21-year-old Nakia Stewart Jr. of Washington, DC.On January 29, 2021, at approximately 8:55 pm, patrol officers responded to an area hospital for the report of a walk-in shooting victim. Stewart had been driven to the hospital for treatment of multiple gunshot wounds. He died a short time later.  The preliminary investigation determined that Stewart had been shot in a parking lot in the 2600 block of Shadyside Avenue in Suitland. Detectives are actively working to establish a motive and identify suspect(s). Preliminarily, detectives do not believe this was a random crime.  If anyone has information relevant to this investigation, they are asked to please call detectives at 301-516-2512. Callers wishing to remain anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477), go online at www.pgcrimesolvers.com, or use the “P3 Tips” mobile app (search “P3 Tips” in the Apple Store or Google Play to download the app onto your mobile device.)
